entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8.

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:49 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or freezing rain. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to freezing rain in the evening then to rain near midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening. Forecast issued 10:49 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
